thread.title: Wegmans opening new store this weekend
thread.title_full: Wegmans opening new store this weekend

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Wegmans opening new store this weekend
text:
Gates-based grocer Wegmans Food Markets plans to open the doors of its fourth store in Massachusetts this weekend. It's new 122,000-square-foot store in Westwood, about 25 miles southwest of Boston, is scheduled to open Sunday morning. The store will have some features similar to many Rochester-area stores, including a Market Cafe' and areas for prepared food, meat, seafood and cheese. The store will also have a wine and beer shop, a pharmacy and more.
"Our team has been working for months in anticipation of opening day, and weâ€™re ready to deliver on our promise of incredible customer service," said Westwood Store Manager Dave Orlovsky.
Wegmans currently has 87 total stores in New York, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, Virginia, Maryland and Massachusetts, and is working on several new stores in those states. It employs more than 44,000 and had annual sales of $7.4 billion in 2014, according to its website.
TCLAUSEN@Gannett.com
